title.rendered: Official Western College Prospectus 2024 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The Western College consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Western College admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Western College based on the information provided within it.

Western College Student Portal

Note: Western College’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

Western College Prospectus 2024

The Western College   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.westol.co.za/.

Western College PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD

see also Coastal College Prospectus 2024 – Download Now
